title: Requirements Engineering Role-Play Workshop: Strengthening Core Competencies for Project Success

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental software development processes
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with advanced domain expertise but limited practical experience in requirements engineering. The course is structured primarily around smartphone-based activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the complexity of requirements gathering by experiencing diverse stakeholder roles
Learners can apply methods to clearly describe the background and rationale of requirements through real-case analysis
Learners can present three or more reasons why requirements engineering is critical to project success factors

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
